Web Scraping Code¶

Prova a scrivere qualcosa

Overview¶

webScraping

dataCleaning

Functions¶

webScraping.getId() → int¶

Get the id of the anime from the csv file named animeid.csv previously created copying the informations from api/anime_informations.csv

Returns

The first anime id in the csv file.

Return type

int

webScraping.getPage(malId: int) → Tuple¶

Get the anime that you need to scrape starting from the id of the anime

Parameters

malId (int) – Id of the anime.

Returns

Tuple containing status code, page url and page content.

Return type

Tuple

webScraping.getDirector(response: str) → str¶

Scrape the informations about anime director from the response

Parameters

response (str) – Response of the page of the anime.

Returns

Produer of the anime.

Return type

str

webScraping.getRatingAndReviews(response: str) → Tuple¶

Get the reviews and votes of the anime.

Parameters

response (str) – Response of the page of the anime.

Returns

List of votes and list of reviews.

Return type

Tuple

webScraping.getRecommendations(id: int, response: str) → list¶

Scrape the anime recommendations’ ids from the response

Parameters

  • id (int) – Id of the anime.

  • response (str) – Response of the page of the anime.

Returns

List of recommendations’ ids.

Return type

list

webScraping.getStudios(response: str) → str¶

Scrape the informations about animeStudios from the response

Parameters

response (str) – Response of the page of the anime.

Returns

Studios of the anime.

Return type

str

webScraping.studiosandDirectorCsv(id: int, animeStudios: str, director: str) → None¶

Write the informations about the anime in a csv file named animeStudiosandDirector.csv

Parameters

  • id (int) – Id of the anime.

  • animeStudios (str) – Studios of the anime.

  • director (str) – Director of the anime.

Returns

None.

webScraping.recommendationsCsv(id: int, recommendations: list) → None¶

Write the recommendations in a csv file named anime_recommendations.csv

Parameters

  • id (int) – Id of the anime.

  • recommendations (list) – List of recommendations’ ids.

Returns

None.

webScraping.removeFirstRow() → None¶

Remove first row of csv file from which the id is taken.

Returns

None.

webScraping.reviewsCsv(id: int, votes: list, reviews: list) → None¶

Write the reviews in a csv file named anime_reviews.csv

Parameters

  • id (int) – Id of the anime.

  • votes (list) – List of votes.

  • reviews (list.) – List of reviews’ texts.

Returns

None.

dataCleaning.cleanReviews() → None¶

Open the csv file and foreach line modify it to have Overall, Story, Animation, Sound, Charachter, Enjoyment columns and rewrite it in another csv file. named cleanedReviews.csv.

Returns

None.

dataCleaning.digitsInLine(charList: list) → int¶

Return the number of digits in a list.

Parameters

charList (list) – List of characters.

Returns

Number of digits in the list.

Return type

int

dataCleaning.evaluationsListtoString(list: list) → str¶

Convert a list of valutations to a string with the valutations separated by a pipe to insert them in csv file.

Parameters

list (list) – List of valutations.

Returns

String with the valutations separated by a pipe.

Returns

str

dataCleaning.getEvaluations(line: str) → list¶

Get the list of different valutations of the anime from review csv in order Overall, Story, Animation, Sound, Charachter, Enjoyment.

Parameters

line (str) – Line of the csv file.

Returns

List of valutations.

Return type

list

dataCleaning.improveReviewText(review: str) → str¶

Improve the text of the review removing extra spaces.

Parameters

review (str) – Text of the review.

Returns

New text of the review.

Returns

str
